name: Manjulika - Indian Horror game
description:
The story is about You releasing Manjulika from Dark world ( hell ) by breaking the spell which was used to captured her and now you are stuck in an old haunted house with her. it gets really scary sometime. she doesn't want you to leave.

Manjulika is now threatening you that you only have 3 days to escape after that she will start giving physical punishment,
After 3 days of trying to escape Manjulika has decided to teach you a lesson.

If you Escape this haunted house, you will be Released but keep in mind no one before you have been successful in doing it.

If you want to enjoy an experience of fantasy, horror, thrill and fear, play now "Manjulika - Indian Horror Game". The action and the shouts are guaranteed.


Thanks for playing this game, i hope it was thrilling for you.
